Nyumbanii

Professional Rental Management Platform for Kenya

Bridging the Gap Between Landlords and Tenants

Nyumbanii is Kenya's leading rental property management platform that simplifies the relationship between landlords and tenants. Our comprehensive solution helps property owners manage multiple properties, track rent payments, handle maintenance requests, and communicate with tenants seamlessly.

Key Features

  • Property Management: Manage multiple properties, units, and tenants from one dashboard
  • M-Pesa Integration: Automatic rent payment reconciliation with M-Pesa transactions
  • Maintenance Tracking: Submit and track maintenance requests in real-time
  • Payment Tracking: Automated rent reminders and payment history
  • Document Management: Store and share important documents securely
  • Lease Management: Create, sign, and manage lease agreements digitally
  • Team Collaboration: Add property managers and maintenance staff

For Landlords

Streamline your rental business with automated rent collection, financial reporting, tenant screening, and comprehensive property analytics. Track occupancy rates, manage multiple properties, and stay on top of maintenance requests all in one place.

For Tenants

Pay rent conveniently via M-Pesa, submit maintenance requests instantly, access your payment history, store important documents, and communicate directly with your landlord through our secure platform.

Why Choose Nyumbanii?

  • Built specifically for the Kenyan rental market
  • M-Pesa integration for seamless payments
  • Mobile-first design optimized for smartphones
  • Secure cloud-based platform
  • Real-time notifications and updates
  • Professional support team

Get Started Today

Join thousands of landlords and tenants managing their rentals efficiently
